text: Fulgensius Billy Paji Keraf (born 8 May 1997) is an Indonesian professional footballer who plays as a winger for Liga 2 club Kalteng Putra. ==Career== ===Persib Bandung=== He made his professionally debut in the Liga 1 on 22 April 2017, against PS TNI. He signed in to substitute Angga Febryanto on 35 minutes first half. And his debut, He success give one assist to Atep in the 53rd minute. On 3 May 2017, he scored his first goal against Gresik United in injury time and made Persib Bandung a 1–0 win over hosts Gresik United. == Honours == === International === Indonesia * AFF U-22 Youth Championship: 2019 ==External links== * Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:Association football wingers Category:Indonesian footballers Category:Persib Bandung players Category:Borneo F.C. players Category:Badak Lampung F.C. players Category:Sportspeople from East Nusa Tenggara
title: Billy Keraf
